protein.specific_function: Electrogenic sodium/bicarbonate cotransporter with a Na(+):HCO3(-) stoichiometry varying from 1:2 to 1:3. May regulate bicarbonate influx/efflux at the basolateral membrane of cells and regulate intracellular pH

reference.reference_text: Burnham CE, Amlal H, Wang Z, Shull GE, Soleimani M: Cloning and functional expression of a human kidney Na+:HCO3- cotransporter. J Biol Chem. 1997 Aug 1;272(31):19111-4.
